title: Historian on the post war economy - effect

content.prompt: One significant result of the economic trend described in the excerpt was the

choices.label: rise of the sexual revolution in the United States
decrease in the number of immigrants seeking entry to the United States
rise of the Sun Belt as a political and economic force
decrease in the number of women in the workforce

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
